entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
